Title: Into the Dark
Description:
My Blacktalon forces continue to secure the laboratory, but I think we are done here, $n.

We have secured some slitherdrakes to take us down to the central platform. From there we can continue below, to where Sarkareth fell.

I am certain Ebyssian and Emberthal will benefit from our presence.
ObjectivesText: Meet with Ebyssian and Emberthal in the room at the bottom of the laboratory.

Objectives.Text: Ride the slitherdrakes to Neltharion's Sanctum
Meet up with Ebyssian and Emberthal
Reach the upper platform of the Onyx Laboratory
Pass through the Edge of Oblivion
